item.description:
This event will be hosted by myself and Theo- the event will be held at her house close to downtown Noho and address will be mailed to people who want to join us.
It will be an indoor gathering if weather is bad- but we can still grill outside.

We will provide salad and desert and so please bring food for grillin'

I am thinking about doing a short presentation on building a website using wordpress as a content management system if I can rassle (sp?) up a projector.

...Another fun opportunity to discuss all web related stuff while enjoying a warm [or cold] summer night.

Email me and I will send you the address of the location

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Noho Web Devlprs Geek BBQue (Potluck and BYOB)
